00011 #include "WPIStatus.h"

00013 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kAddress;
00014 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kManufacturerBaseRegister;
00015 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kManufacturerSize;
00016 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kSensorTypeBaseRegister;
00017 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kSensorTypeSize;
00018 const UINT8 HiTechnicCompass::kHeadingRegister;
00019 
00025 HiTechnicCompass::HiTechnicCompass(UINT32 slot)
00026     : m_i2c (NULL)
00027 {
00028     DigitalModule *module = DigitalModule::GetInstance(slot);
00029     if (module)
00030     {
00031         m_i2c = module->GetI2C(kAddress);
00032     
00033         // Verify Sensor
00034         const UINT8 kExpectedManufacturer[] = "HiTechnc";
00035         const UINT8 kExpectedSensorType[] = "Compass ";
00036         if ( ! m_i2c->VerifySensor(kManufacturerBaseRegister, kManufacturerSize, kExpectedManufacturer) )
00037         {
00038             wpi_fatal(CompassManufacturerError);
00039             return;
00040         }
00041         if ( ! m_i2c->VerifySensor(kSensorTypeBaseRegister, kSensorTypeSize, kExpectedSensorType) )
00042         {
00043             wpi_fatal(CompassTypeError);
00044         }
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00051 HiTechnicCompass::~HiTechnicCompass()
00052 {
00053     delete m_i2c;
00054     m_i2c = NULL;
00055 }
00056 
00064 float HiTechnicCompass::GetAngle()
00065 {
00066     UINT16 heading = 0;
00067     if (m_i2c)
00068     {
00069         m_i2c->Read(kHeadingRegister, sizeof(heading), (UINT8 *)&heading);
00070 
00071         // Sensor is little endian... swap bytes
00072         heading = (heading >> 8) | (heading << 8);
00073     }
00074     return (float)heading;
00075 }
